name: Deep Forest - Ludum Dare 48
description:
Objectives

Score points by going the forest and kill all enemies along your way! It may seem easy at first, but the forest grow denser and the enemies more numerous as you go deeper.

Controls

Move using LMB, Shoot using RMG and throw your firebombs using Q.

Assets

Tree asset by KenneyNL.

Source

The code was written by two developers. One of which were new to Unity.
